long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dive into the captivating world of "Straight 4," a modern take on the timeless connect-four game. Challenge your friends or test your skills against intelligent AI opponents in this strategic and thrilling board game.

Key Features:

 - Timeless Gameplay: Experience the classic connect-four gameplay, where the objective is to be the first to connect four of your colored discs in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.

 - Multiplayer Excitement: Engage in heated battles with friends or family members. The multiplayer mode allows for head-to-head matches, bringing a social and competitive element to the game.

 - Intelligent AI Opponents: For solo players, challenge yourself against AI opponents of varying difficulty levels. Sharpen your strategic thinking as you face off against an adaptive virtual opponent.

 - Sleek and Intuitive Interface: Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed for seamless gameplay. Easily drop your discs into the grid with simple and intuitive controls.

 - Customization Options: Personalize your gaming experience with customizable themes and board designs. Make the game uniquely yours while enjoying the nostalgia of this beloved classic.

How to Play:

 - Launch the "Straight 4" extension on your Chrome browser.
 - Choose your opponent—friend or AI—and set the game preferences.
 - Take turns strategically placing your colored discs on the grid.
 - Form a straight line of four discs to claim victory and demonstrate your connect-four mastery.
